name: Passimian
description: They form groups of roughly 20 individuals. Their mutual bond is remarkable—they will never let down a comrade.

abilities.name: Receiver
abilities.effect: When an ally faints, this Pokémon gains its Ability.
abilities.description: The Pokémon copies the Ability of a defeated ally.

abilities.name: Defiant
abilities.effect: When any of this Pokémon's stats are lowered, its Attack rises by two stages.  If multiple stats are lowered at once, this ability takes effect with each stat lowered.
abilities.description: When its stats are lowered its Attack increases.
